snippet.title: Rockin'Space - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Rockin'Space!

Android: https://goo.gl/mSZiir
iOS: https://geo.itunes.apple.com/us/app/rockinspace-fight-in-space/id1028642644?mt=8

Thousands of asteroids have been spotted impacting the Earth’s atmosphere. Leaders of major world powers have teamed up to create the Spacebars squad, which must defend the human race.

Destroy the enemy. Save the world. BE A HERO.

CHOOSE YOUR SPACEBOT!
Each spaceship has unique skills that you’ll find as you battle in space.

ENEMIES EVERYWHERE!
You’ll have to learn navigation and combat skills to avoid the asteroids around you. Be careful! You’ll face deadly enemies trying to knock you down before you spot them.

Don’t be intimidated and destroy everything in your path!

STAY ALERT!
Use your radar to track down nearby enemies, anticipate their actions and build your combat strategy. But don’t be so confident! There are very fast enemies which will put your best skills to test.

IMPROVE YOUR FIGHTING SKILLS!
You’ll find collectibles on the battlefield that will allow you to upgrade your skills and heal from attacks. Don’t waste them! These items are limited and difficult to obtain. Use them wisely.

WELCOME TO ROCKIN’SPACE!
Let the battle begin…

———————
Discover more games: http://exagames-studio.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exagames.studio
